thread.title: Trump's tax overhaul a blow to affordable housing

title: Trump's tax overhaul a blow to affordable housing
text:
Trump's tax overhaul a blow to affordable housing 5:54am EST - 02:43 
A tax credit meant to encourage the private sector to invest in affordable housing has diminished in value since the corporate tax rate was reduced in December and that could mean cut backs in new projects. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A tax credit meant to encourage the private sector to invest in affordable housing has diminished in value since the corporate tax rate was reduced in December and that could mean cut backs in new projects.
